name: International Conference on Innovative Teaching and Education
content: Join us for the International Conference on Innovative Teaching and Education (ITECONF) 2025, taking place in the lively city of London, UK. Hosted at the University of London from 26 to 28 September 2025, this event will unite top educators, researchers, and professionals from around the world to explore the future of teaching and education. Why Attend ITECONF 2025? World-Class Teaching and Education Conference: Engage with thought leaders, researchers, and practitioners from around the globe. This event serves as a platform for sharing groundbreaking ideas and fostering international collaboration in the field of education. Showcase Your Research: Present your findings to a global audience through oral or poster sessions, positioning your research at the forefront of international educational discussions. Publishing Opportunities: All accepted presentations will be included in the Conference Abstract Book with an ISBN. Full papers will be considered for publication in leading indexed journals such as SCOPUS, Web of Science, and DOAJ, with each paper assigned a DOI for citation. Discover London: Enjoy a complimentary guided tour of London, where you’ll have the chance to explore historical landmarks, indulge in world-class dining, and relax in the city’s beautiful parks, all while networking with fellow attendees. Flexible Attendance Options: Participate in person or virtually, with options designed to accommodate different preferences and travel restrictions. Important Dates: Abstract Submission Deadline: 05 September 2025 Early Registration Deadline: 20 March 2025 Late Registration Deadline: 16 September 2025 Conference Dates: 26 – 28 September 2025 Why You Should Be There: ITECONF 2025 is a must-attend event for anyone involved in teaching and education. Whether you’re an academic, researcher, educator, or student, this conference provides a unique opportunity to present your research, engage in thought-provoking discussions, and connect with a global network of experts. Participate in inspiring keynote presentations, interactive sessions, and numerous opportunities for professional development. Participation Options: Presenter: Share your research through an oral or poster presentation. Listener: Attend sessions, engage in discussions, and network with global experts. In-Person or Virtual: Attend in person or opt for virtual participation to suit your convenience. Additional Highlights: Explore London: Join a free guided tour of one of Europe’s most vibrant cities, while making valuable connections with other attendees. Publication Benefits: Make your research more accessible and citable through DOI assignment and publication in prestigious indexed journals. Don’t miss out on ITECONF 2025—register now and immerse yourself in a career-enhancing experience in the iconic city of London, UK!
